Dialogue.Page: We came here from the Silverflame system to escape its dying star. Unfortunatley, our vessel, <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, suffered damage upon our arival.
The black hole in our Central Warp Core malfunctioned in some way, and now <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> is rapidly miniaturizing into it!
Worse still, we couldn't even recover any of our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color> as most of the computers were stuck telling us to evacuate.

If <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> isn't fixed, we won't be able to recover our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color>. And, if those logs aren't recovered, all the knowledge we gained will be lost.
If only we had enough time to fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>...
We appreciate your offer, but I'm worried there's just no chance for us to save our exploration logs.
We would need to figure out what's wrong with <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, find a solution, and fix <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> all before it is sucked into the black hole.
We only had just over 20 minutes to evacuate so, unfortunately, I don't see any way to get all that done in what little time we have...

If you want to try anyways, you can use this shuttle behind me to warp directly to <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, though it may be wise to bring your own ship just in case. Just make sure to evacuate if you can't fix [SP NAME] before it's completely gone.
We will take time to explore the other miniature systems in this area, then see if any nearby Nomai would be willing to share their Vessel with us.
